text: Hasan Abdal railway station (Urdu and ) is located in Hasan Abdal town, Attock district of Punjab province, Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Attock District Category:Railway stations on Karachi–Peshawar Line (ML 1)
title: Hasan Abdal railway station
